plot: Orange Heart is the story of two Mississippi artists coming together for a collaborative project. A blues artist and a metal sculptor combine their skills in a remarkable exercise to turn one man's trash into a another man's treasure.
title: Orange Heart
plot_es: Orange Heart is the story of two Mississippi artists coming together for a collaborative project. A blues artist and a metal sculptor combine their skills in a remarkable exercise to turn one man's trash into a another man's treasure.
plot_en: Orange Heart is the story of two Mississippi artists coming together for a collaborative project. A blues artist and a metal sculptor combine their skills in a remarkable exercise to turn one man's trash into a another man's treasure.
